	<section class="post__column post__column-02">

		<div class="post__header">
			<h1 class="post__title">Autoaceitao do corpo e um foda-se para a opinio alheia</h1>
			<p class="post__info">
				Em 11/11/2016				/
				<a href="http://superela.com/corpo/" >Corpo</a>				/&nbsp;

				448 acessos
			</p>

			 <div class="user"><a href="http://superela.com/colunista/sylvia-nazareth/" class="user__image-link"><img class="user__image" src="http://superela.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/16753989_1553708624657175_1061835943_n-86x86.jpg"></a><p class="user__name"><a href="http://superela.com/colunista/sylvia-nazareth/" class="user__name-link">Sylvia Nazareth</a></p><p class="user__career">Colunista Superela</p>   <p class="user__more-texts"><a class="button button--small button--color-01 user__button" href="http://superela.com/colunista/sylvia-nazareth/"><span>Mais textos</span></a></p> <div class='user__icons'></div> </div>

		</div>

		
		<img class="post__featured-image" src="http://superela.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/2031f9d3ff80580233f0dfa2feec81e0-369x450.jpg"/>

		<div class="facebook-like">
			 <div class="fb-like" data-href="http://superela.com/autoceitacao-do-corpo" data-width="250" data-layout="standard" data-action="like" data-show-faces="false" data-share="false"></div>
		</div>

		<div class="sharing-buttons sharing-buttons-horizontal">
			 <div class="sharing-buttons__list">  <a class="sharing-buttons__item sharing-buttons__facebook" onclick="window.open('https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=http://superela.com/autoceitacao-do-corpo', 'Superela - Facebook sharing', 'width=800, height=730')"><svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 40 40" style="enable-background:new 0 0 40 40" xml:space="preserve"><path fill="#FFFFFF" d="M30.2,6H9.8C7.7,6,6,7.7,6,9.8v20.5C6,32.3,7.7,34,9.8,34h10.1l0-10h-2.6c-0.3,0-0.6-0.3-0.6-0.6 l0-3.2c0-0.3,0.3-0.6,0.6-0.6h2.6v-3.1c0-3.6,2.2-5.6,5.4-5.6h2.6c0.3,0,0.6,0.3,0.6,0.6v2.7c0,0.3-0.3,0.6-0.6,0.6l-1.6,0 c-1.8,0-2.1,0.8-2.1,2.1v2.7h3.9c0.4,0,0.7,0.3,0.6,0.7l-0.4,3.2c0,0.3-0.3,0.5-0.6,0.5h-3.5l0,10h6c2.1,0,3.8-1.7,3.8-3.8V9.8 C34,7.7,32.3,6,30.2,6z"/></svg> </a><a class="sharing-buttons__item sharing-buttons__twitter" onclick="window.open('http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Superela - Autoaceitao do corpo e um foda-se para a opinio alheia - http://superela.com/autoceitacao-do-corpo', 'Superela - Twitter sharing', 'width=800, height=660')"><svg version="1.1" id="Layer_1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 40 40" style="enable-background:new 0 0 40 40" xml:space="preserve"><path fill="#FFFFFF" d="M34.2,11.3c-0.6,0.3-1.2,0.5-1.9,0.6c0.7-0.7,1.2-1.5,1.5-2.5l0,0c0.1-0.3-0.2-0.5-0.4-0.4l0,0 c-0.9,0.5-1.9,0.9-2.9,1.2c-0.1,0-0.1,0-0.2,0c-0.2,0-0.4-0.1-0.5-0.2c-1.1-0.9-2.4-1.5-3.9-1.5c-0.6,0-1.2,0.1-1.9,0.3 c-1.9,0.6-3.4,2.2-3.8,4.1c-0.2,0.7-0.2,1.5-0.1,2.2c0,0.1,0,0.1-0.1,0.2c0,0-0.1,0.1-0.2,0.1c0,0,0,0,0,0 c-4.2-0.4-7.9-2.4-10.6-5.6l0,0c-0.1-0.2-0.4-0.1-0.5,0l0,0C8.3,10.8,8,11.8,8,12.8c0,1.6,0.6,3.1,1.7,4.2c-0.5-0.1-0.9-0.3-1.3-0.5 l0,0c-0.2-0.1-0.5,0-0.5,0.3l0,0c0,2.4,1.4,4.5,3.4,5.4c0,0-0.1,0-0.1,0c-0.3,0-0.7,0-1-0.1l0,0c-0.2,0-0.4,0.2-0.3,0.4l0,0 c0.7,2.1,2.5,3.6,4.6,4c-1.8,1.2-3.9,1.8-6.1,1.8l-0.7,0c-0.2,0-0.4,0.1-0.4,0.3c-0.1,0.2,0,0.4,0.2,0.5c2.4,1.4,5.2,2.2,8.1,2.2 c2.5,0,4.8-0.5,6.9-1.5c1.9-0.9,3.6-2.2,5.1-3.8c1.3-1.5,2.4-3.3,3.1-5.2c0.7-1.8,1.1-3.8,1.1-5.7v-0.1c0-0.3,0.1-0.6,0.4-0.8 c0.9-0.7,1.7-1.6,2.3-2.6l0,0C34.7,11.5,34.4,11.2,34.2,11.3L34.2,11.3z"/></svg></a></div>
		</div>

		<div class="post__content">
			<p>Acho que eu tinha 10 anos quando comeou. Mas vamos marcar o incio aos 13, quando eu entrei pra puberdade e comecei a engordar. Ser negra e magricela j no me ajudava naquele universo de amizades cheio de <em>Giseles Bundchens</em>, imagina ento <a href="http://superela.com/mc-carol-colocou-um-ponto-final-na-discussao-peso-vs-saude/" target="_blank">ser negra e gorda</a>. Eu descobri o que era no ser atraente antes de descobrir o que era sentir atrao. &#8220;O que os garotos gostam&#8221; se tornou uma questo enorme pra mim cedo demais. Minhas amigas comeavam a namorar e eu nunca nem tinha beijado na boca. Eu precisava de constante <a href="http://superela.com/com-7-anos-de-idade-nos-ja-acreditamos-que-nao-somos-boas-o-suficiente/" target="_blank">afirmao em relao a minha aparncia</a>. Cresci, me curei, me libertei. Olhei em volta e percebi que tem muita gente que sofre disso aos 20, aos 30, aos 50 anos.</p>
<p>Eu no culpo <a href="http://superela.com/2015/05/22/4-conselhos-errados-voce-aprendeu-com-revistas-femininas/" target="_blank">a revista Capricho</a>, a quantidade maquiagem que eu usava ou as roupas que eu vestia para impressionar os meninos no era porque me obrigavam. Era um condicionamento meu. Eu pensava que se eu for na matin e nenhum garoto quiser ficar comigo, queria dizer que eu era mesmo um caso perdido. Eu deveria desistir dessa ideiade ser bonita. Eu nunca chegaria aos ps das minhas amigas que ficavam com quem quisessem. S quem me elogiava era minha famlia, mas eu precisava que fosse unanime. Precisava que o cara mais atraente (de acordo com meu muito refinado gosto adolescente) me achasse maravilhosa. Se os caras com padres de beleza elevados demais pra realidade no me considerassem boa o suficiente era porque eu no merecia.</p>
<p><img class="aligncenter" src="http://superela.com/wp-content/themes/simplemag//superela.com/wp-content/themes/simplemag/images/banners/banner-super-profissionais-horizontal-mobile-empty.gif" data-src="https://media.giphy.com/media/6J60YvVRb7ih2/giphy.gif" alt="Autoaceitao do corpo - 2" width="456" height="345" /><noscript><img class="aligncenter" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/6J60YvVRb7ih2/giphy.gif" alt="Autoaceitao do corpo - 2" width="456" height="345" /></noscript></p>
<h2>Sobre a<strong>autoaceitao do corpo</strong></h2>
<p>O problema  que eles no achavam. <a href="http://superela.com/fotos-de-celulites-no-Instagram" target="_blank">Eu nunca fui padro de nada</a>. Minha adolescncia foi uma coleo de inseguranas. Cada vez eu me gostava menos. Eu precisei brigar comigo mesma pra entender que cara nenhum pode definir meu valor. Que eu no tenho que gostar de mim porque &#8220;tem cara que gosta de gordinha&#8221;. A aceitao ou desaprovao masculina no tem que ser uma questo levada em conta. A gente tem que se cuidar pra gente. Pra se sentir forte, se sentir pronta. Pra encarar o mundo de frente. Pra lidar com o que o universo empurrar pra gente.</p>
<p>A <strong>autoaceitao do corpo</strong> no  &#8220;auto&#8221; se ainda depende da aprovao alheia.  claro que a gente vai querer ser desejado. Mas isso no tem que virar uma necessidade. Tem que ser a cereja do bolo. Um &#8220;estou me sentindo tima hoje&#8221; tem que vir antes do &#8220;hoje fui muito paquerada&#8221;. At porque quanto mais a gente se sente bem consigo mesma, mais chamamos ateno. No s sexualmente falando, mas as pessoas preferem conversar e trabalhar com pessoas seguras de si. Quanto mais gostarmos de ns mesmas mais fcil fica pra lidar com nossos prprios defeitos.</p>
<p>Nunca  tarde demais, mas eu queria saber disso aos 13. Eu queria no ter perdido tanto tempo me economizando por medo de aparecer. Me escondendo dentro de limites que eu mesma criava. Deixando de usar o que eu queria, de ir aonde eu queria por medo de &#8220;quem essa garota acha que ?&#8221;. Quem eu acho que eu sou? Eu acho que eu sou tima. E se voc no concorda comigo, bom, isso  a sua opinio. E eu no preciso que ningum concorde comigo.</p>
<div style="width: 490px" class="wp-caption aligncenter"><img src="http://superela.com/wp-content/themes/simplemag//superela.com/wp-content/themes/simplemag/images/banners/banner-super-profissionais-horizontal-mobile-empty.gif" data-src="https://media.giphy.com/media/iNoe615WAD8qc/giphy.gif" alt="autoaceitao do corpo - 3" width="480" height="360" /><noscript><img src="https://media.giphy.com/media/iNoe615WAD8qc/giphy.gif" alt="autoaceitao do corpo - 3" width="480" height="360" /></noscript><p class="wp-caption-text"><em>Eu no ligo se voc no gosta de mim. Eu me amo </em></p></div>
<p><em>Imagem: Pinterest</em></p>
		</div>

<script src="//code.jquery.com/jquery-1.12.3.min.js"></script>
<script>
  jQuery(document).ready(function(){
		(function($){
				$.fn.shuffle = function() {
						var allElems = this.get(),
								getRandom = function(max) {
										return Math.floor(Math.random() * max);
								},
								shuffled = $.map(allElems, function(){
										var random = getRandom(allElems.length),
												randEl = $(allElems[random]).clone(true)[0];
										allElems.splice(random, 1);
										return randEl;
							 });
						this.each(function(i){
								$(this).replaceWith($(shuffled[i]));
						});
						return $(shuffled);
				};
		})(jQuery);

		var clubeQuestionIds =  $("input[name^='question-id']");
	  var clubeQuestionId = clubeQuestionIds[clubeQuestionIds.length-1];
		$.ajax({
				 url: "http://superela.com/clube/webservice?page=get_post&post_id=" + clubeQuestionId.value,
				 async: true,
				 dataType: 'json',
				 complete: function(result) {
					 var text = JSON.stringify(result);
					 var response = JSON.parse(text);
					 var obj = JSON.parse(response.responseText.toString().slice(1, -1));
					 var totalComments = Object.keys(obj.comments).length;
					 var cleanTitle = removeDiacritics(obj.title.toLowerCase());
					 var url = cleanTitle.replace(/ /g,"-");;
					 var categoria;
					 switch (obj.category_id) {
						 case "7":
						 		categoria = "amor";
						 		break;
						 case "8":
						 		categoria = "sexo";
						 		break;
						 case "9":
						 		categoria = "vida";
						 		break;
						 case "10":
						 		categoria = "beleza";
						 		break;
						 case "11":
						 		categoria = "estilo";
						 		break;
					 }

					 var divPerguntaClube = document.createElement("div");
					 divPerguntaClube.classList.add("post__content");
					 var html = '<h2>'+ obj.title +'</h2>' +
											'<p>'+ obj.description +'</p>' +
											'<p style="font-size:14px;">Enviada por <strong>'+ obj.name + '</strong> na categoria ' +
												'<a href="//superela.com/clube/' + obj.id + '/' + url + '?utm_source=textos&utm_campaign=categoria&utm_medium=pergunta-final-textos" target="_blank" style="color:#DE1A60;">' +
												'<strong>'+ categoria + '</strong></a> do <a	href="//superela.com/clube/' + obj.id + '/' + url + '?utm_source=textos&utm_campaign=categoria-' + url + '&utm_medium=pergunta-final-textos" target="_blank" style="color:#DE1A60;"><strong>Clube Superela</strong></a>' +
											'</p>' +
											'<span style="display: inline-block;width: 25px;height: 25px;text-align: center;margin-right: 7px;vertical-align: top;border-radius: 100px;padding: 0;font-size: 12px;line-height: 26px;font-weight: bold;color: #fff !important;background-color: #f00e69;text-transform: uppercase;overflow: hidden;">'
												+ totalComments +
											'</span>'+
											'<a href="//superela.com/clube/' + obj.id + '/' + url + '?utm_source=textos&utm_campaign=link-respostas-ate-agora&utm_medium=pergunta-final-textos" target="_blank"	style="color:#DE1A60; font-weight:bold; font-size:14px;">respostas at agora </a>' +
											'<a href="//superela.com/clube/' + obj.id + '/' + url + '?utm_source=textos&utm_campaign=campo-escreva-sua-resposta&utm_medium=pergunta-final-textos" target="_blank"><div style="calc(100% - 22px); background:#fafafa; border: 1px solid #cacaca; border-radius: 5px; padding: 10px; margin-top:15px;"><img width="160" height="16" src="http://superela.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/escreva.gif"></div></a>';
					divPerguntaClube.innerHTML = html;
					clubeQuestionId.parentNode.insertBefore(divPerguntaClube, clubeQuestionId);
				 }
			});
	});

	var lastCurrentPost = null;
	var isLastPost = false;
	var screenHeight;
	var bottomMarginPostDetection = 200;
	var firstRelatedPostsGroup;
	var lastRelatedPostsGroup;

	// --------------------------------
	window.onresize = function () {
		screenHeight = window.innerHeight;
	}
	window.onresize();

	// --------------------------------
	function verifyToLoadPost () {
		var currentPost = getCurrentPost();
		//if (lastCurrentPost != null) console.log("post ativo: " + lastCurrentPost.getAttribute("data-posturl"));
		if (currentPost != lastCurrentPost) {
			lastCurrentPost = currentPost;
      var lastCurrentPostUrl = lastCurrentPost.getAttribute("data-posturl");
			history.pushState(null, null, lastCurrentPost.getAttribute("data-posturl"));
			ga('send', 'pageview', lastCurrentPostUrl.replace("http://superela.com", ""));

			if (isLastPost) {
				loadNextPost();
			}
		}
	}
	verifyToLoadPost();
	setInterval(verifyToLoadPost, 50);

	// --------------------------------
	function getCurrentPost () {

		isLastPost = false;
		var screenTopPosition = window.pageYOffset;
		var posts = document.getElementsByClassName("post");
		for (var i=posts.length-1; i>=0; i--) {
			var post = posts[i];
			var postTopPosition = post.offsetTop;
			var postRelativePosition = postTopPosition - screenTopPosition;
			if (postRelativePosition <= screenHeight - bottomMarginPostDetection) {
				if (i==posts.length-1) isLastPost = true;
				return post;
				break;
			}
		}

	}

	// --------------------------------
	function loadNextPost() {

		var relatedPostsGroups = document.getElementsByClassName("related-posts");
		firstRelatedPostsGroup = relatedPostsGroups[0];
		lastRelatedPostsGroup = relatedPostsGroups[relatedPostsGroups.length-1];
		var firstRelatedPostURL = lastRelatedPostsGroup.getElementsByTagName('a')[0].getAttribute('href');

		var firstRelatedPostId = lastRelatedPostsGroup.getElementsByTagName('li')[0].getAttribute('data-poid');
		firstRelatedPostId = firstRelatedPostId.replace("in-", "");

		var postURL = "/wp-content/themes/simplemag/single/post.php?post_url=" + firstRelatedPostURL + "&post_id=" + firstRelatedPostId;

		$.ajax({
			url: postURL,
			dataType: 'html',
			async: true,
			complete: function(result) {
				$("body").append(result.responseText);

				relatedPostsGroups = document.getElementsByClassName("related-posts");
				lastRelatedPostsGroup = relatedPostsGroups[relatedPostsGroups.length-1];

				$("ul.related_post.wp_rp:last li").shuffle();

				loadPromotedLinks();

				//loadComments(firstRelatedPostURL);
				var posts = document.getElementsByClassName("post");
				var lastPost = posts[posts.length-1];

				FB.XFBML.parse(lastPost);
				adjust_video_dimension();
			}
		});

	}

	// --------------------------------
	var promotedLinksInterval;
	function loadPromotedLinks() {

		promotedLinksInterval = setInterval(function() {
			isFirstPromotedLinksLoaded = (document.querySelector('.AdBox')==null) ? false : true;

			var firstRelatedPosts = firstRelatedPostsGroup.querySelectorAll('li');
			var lastRelatedPosts = lastRelatedPostsGroup.querySelectorAll('li');
			for (var i=4; i<lastRelatedPosts.length; i++) {
				lastRelatedPosts[i].innerHTML = firstRelatedPosts[i].innerHTML;
			}

			if (isFirstPromotedLinksLoaded) {
				clearInterval(promotedLinksInterval);
			}
		}, 500);

	}
</script>
<script src="//superela.com/wp-content/themes/simplemag/js/jquery-unveil-lazyload.js"></script>
<script>
$(document).ready(function() {
  $("img").unveil();
});
</script>

    {'base':'x','letters':/[\u0078\u24E7\uFF58\u1E8B\u1E8D]/g},
    {'base':'y','letters':/[\u0079\u24E8\uFF59\u1EF3\u00FD\u0177\u1EF9\u0233\u1E8F\u00FF\u1EF7\u1E99\u1EF5\u01B4\u024F\u1EFF]/g},
    {'base':'z','letters':/[\u007A\u24E9\uFF5A\u017A\u1E91\u017C\u017E\u1E93\u1E95\u01B6\u0225\u0240\u2C6C\uA763]/g}
];
var changes;
function removeDiacritics (str) {
    if(!changes) {
        changes = defaultDiacriticsRemovalMap;
    }
    for(var i=0; i<changes.length; i++) {
        str = str.replace(changes[i].letters, changes[i].base);
    }
    return str.replace(/[^a-z0-9\s]/gi, '').replace(/[_\s]/g, ' ');
}
</script>

		</div>

		<div class="post__content">
			<p>Sndrome do Impostor. Voc j deve ter ouvido falar sobre esse termo, to comum no mundo profissional. Mas, se esse  o seu primeiro contato com essa sensao  muito real  de que voc <span style="color: #0000ff;"><a style="color: #0000ff;" href="http://superela.com/com-7-anos-de-idade-nos-ja-acreditamos-que-nao-somos-boas-o-suficiente/" target="_blank">no  boa o suficiente para fazer o seu trabalho</a></span>, ento talvez seja hora de entender melhor como ele funciona e o que o caracteriza.</p>
<p>A sndrome do impostor no tem nada a ver com mentir sobre o que voc faz, sobre a sua profisso. , na verdade, uma ideia que temos de que a qualquer momento as pessoas vo descobrir que no somos bons naquilo que fazemos e que vamos perder o emprego. A gente acredita que o nosso (pouco) sucesso foi um golpe de sorte e que, do nada, todo mundo vai saber que aquilo foi um erro.</p>
<p> uma <span style="color: #0000ff;"><a style="color: #0000ff;" href="http://superela.com/minha-inseguranca" target="_blank">questo totalmente ligada  insegurana</a></span>. Pessoas que sofrem da sndrome do impostor so muito auto-crticas, no aceitam bem elogios e costumam cair em situaes de auto-boicote a ponto de serem demitidas de um emprego ou pedirem demisso por no acreditarem que so dignas dele.</p>
<p>Abaixo, ns listamos algumas formas de identificar esse problema, olha s:</p>
<h2>1.Voc se pressiona muito</h2>
<p>Seja para fazer uma apresentao no Power Point ou s ajustar um texto que o seu chefe te passou, voc coloca uma presso imensa no trabalho que faz. Tanto que no consegue fazer o servio de uma forma tranquila e acaba sempre frustrada porque nada saiu de acordo com as suas expectativas.</p>
<h2>2.Voc se sabota</h2>
<p>Quando voc se sente como uma fraude o tempo inteiro,  normal se colocar<span style="color: #0000ff;"><a style="color: #0000ff;" href="http://superela.com/2016/08/12/5-formas-de-voce-nao-sabotar-a-sua-carreira/" target="_blank"> em situaes de auto-sabotagem</a></span>. Ou seja, voc mesma faz com que o seu trabalho no saia do jeito que ele deveria e resulte em uma repreenso por parte dos seus chefes. Segundo o Bustle, isso acontece quando voc decide que no  boa o suficiente e precisa deixar isso claro para o mundo antes que as pessoas descubram por si mesmas.</p>
<h2>3.Voc no se acha boa o suficiente</h2>
<p>No adianta, voc pode fazer o trabalho mais incrvel do mundo, ainda assim voc vai ter certeza de que <span style="color: #0000ff;"><a style="color: #0000ff;" href="http://superela.com/2016/06/18/6-dificuldades-de-quem-tem-baixa-autoestima/" target="_blank">no  boa o suficiente</a></span>. E voc comea a acreditar que as outras pessoas tambm acham isso e que, uma hora ou outra, tudo vai explodir na sua cara.</p>
<h2>4.Voc acha que qualquer um pode fazer o seu trabalho</h2>
<p>Por mais que a parte mecnica de um trabalho possa, de fato, ser feita por outra pessoa, ningum mais vai ter as mesmas ideias, personalidade e talentos que voc. Quando somos experts em algo que fazemos quase que de forma natural,  comum pensarmos que qualquer pessoa tambm pode fazer isso  da a sensao que define a sndrome de impostor.</p>
<h2>5.Voc se tornou perfeccionista</h2>
<p>Pessoas que sofrem de sndrome de impostor costumam ser obcecadas com o seu trabalho. Elas fazem horas extras sem necessidade e checam tudo o que fazem mais de uma vez, para garantir que tudo est perfeito. E, como voc pode imaginar, esse tipo de comportamento cansa e pode afetar demais a sua produtividade como um todo.</p>
<p>Pode parecer coisa de louco, mas a sndrome do impostor aparece por causa de uma sementinha que voc colocou na prpria mente, que diz que voc no  boa o suficiente. E como reverter essa situao? Comeando pelas pequenas coisas: primeiro<span style="color: #0000ff;"><a style="color: #0000ff;" href="http://superela.com/2014/06/26/6-pensamentos-negativos-que-estao-te-impedindo-de-ser-feliz/" target="_blank"> no ocupe a mente com pensamentos negativos</a></span>. Toda vez que alguma coisa ruim sobre voc mesma passar na cabea, pare e se pergunte por que.</p>
<p>Depois, vale lembrar que voc foi contratada por um motivo. O seu chefe acredita em voc e confia no seu trabalho. Por isso, no existe motivos para voc achar que est na iminncia de ser demitida o tempo inteiro. Confie que voc tem capacidade de fazer tudo o que quiser  e ser reconhecida por isso!</p>
		</div>

		
		
		<input type="hidden" name="question-id" value="">

		</script> </body></html> <link rel="stylesheet" href="/srv/superela.com/www/wp-content/themes/simplemag/single/css/styles-after.css"><script src="/srv/superela.com/www/wp-content/themes/simplemag/single/js/scripts.min.js"></script> <div id="fb-root"></div><script>(function(d, s, id) {
		var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];

<script src="//code.jquery.com/jquery-1.12.3.min.js"></script>
<script>
  jQuery(document).ready(function(){
		(function($){
				$.fn.shuffle = function() {
						var allElems = this.get(),
								getRandom = function(max) {
										return Math.floor(Math.random() * max);
								},
								shuffled = $.map(allElems, function(){
										var random = getRandom(allElems.length),
												randEl = $(allElems[random]).clone(true)[0];
										allElems.splice(random, 1);
										return randEl;
							 });
						this.each(function(i){
								$(this).replaceWith($(shuffled[i]));
						});
						return $(shuffled);
				};
		})(jQuery);

		var clubeQuestionIds =  $("input[name^='question-id']");
	  var clubeQuestionId = clubeQuestionIds[clubeQuestionIds.length-1];
		$.ajax({
				 url: "http://superela.com/clube/webservice?page=get_post&post_id=" + clubeQuestionId.value,
				 async: true,
				 dataType: 'json',
				 complete: function(result) {
					 var text = JSON.stringify(result);
					 var response = JSON.parse(text);
					 var obj = JSON.parse(response.responseText.toString().slice(1, -1));
					 var totalComments = Object.keys(obj.comments).length;
					 var cleanTitle = removeDiacritics(obj.title.toLowerCase());
					 var url = cleanTitle.replace(/ /g,"-");;
					 var categoria;
					 switch (obj.category_id) {
						 case "7":
						 		categoria = "amor";
						 		break;
						 case "8":
						 		categoria = "sexo";
						 		break;
						 case "9":
						 		categoria = "vida";
						 		break;
						 case "10":
						 		categoria = "beleza";
						 		break;
						 case "11":
						 		categoria = "estilo";
						 		break;
					 }

					 var divPerguntaClube = document.createElement("div");
					 divPerguntaClube.classList.add("post__content");
					 var html = '<h2>'+ obj.title +'</h2>' +
											'<p>'+ obj.description +'</p>' +
											'<p style="font-size:14px;">Enviada por <strong>'+ obj.name + '</strong> na categoria ' +
												'<a href="//superela.com/clube/' + obj.id + '/' + url + '?utm_source=textos&utm_campaign=categoria&utm_medium=pergunta-final-textos" target="_blank" style="color:#DE1A60;">' +
												'<strong>'+ categoria + '</strong></a> do <a	href="//superela.com/clube/' + obj.id + '/' + url + '?utm_source=textos&utm_campaign=categoria-' + url + '&utm_medium=pergunta-final-textos" target="_blank" style="color:#DE1A60;"><strong>Clube Superela</strong></a>' +
											'</p>' +
											'<span style="display: inline-block;width: 25px;height: 25px;text-align: center;margin-right: 7px;vertical-align: top;border-radius: 100px;padding: 0;font-size: 12px;line-height: 26px;font-weight: bold;color: #fff !important;background-color: #f00e69;text-transform: uppercase;overflow: hidden;">'
												+ totalComments +
											'</span>'+
											'<a href="//superela.com/clube/' + obj.id + '/' + url + '?utm_source=textos&utm_campaign=link-respostas-ate-agora&utm_medium=pergunta-final-textos" target="_blank"	style="color:#DE1A60; font-weight:bold; font-size:14px;">respostas at agora </a>' +
											'<a href="//superela.com/clube/' + obj.id + '/' + url + '?utm_source=textos&utm_campaign=campo-escreva-sua-resposta&utm_medium=pergunta-final-textos" target="_blank"><div style="calc(100% - 22px); background:#fafafa; border: 1px solid #cacaca; border-radius: 5px; padding: 10px; margin-top:15px;"><img width="160" height="16" src="http://superela.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/escreva.gif"></div></a>';
					divPerguntaClube.innerHTML = html;
					clubeQuestionId.parentNode.insertBefore(divPerguntaClube, clubeQuestionId);
				 }
			});
	});

	var lastCurrentPost = null;
	var isLastPost = false;
	var screenHeight;
	var bottomMarginPostDetection = 200;
	var firstRelatedPostsGroup;
	var lastRelatedPostsGroup;

	// --------------------------------
	window.onresize = function () {
		screenHeight = window.innerHeight;
	}
	window.onresize();

	// --------------------------------
	function verifyToLoadPost () {
		var currentPost = getCurrentPost();
		//if (lastCurrentPost != null) console.log("post ativo: " + lastCurrentPost.getAttribute("data-posturl"));
		if (currentPost != lastCurrentPost) {
			lastCurrentPost = currentPost;
      var lastCurrentPostUrl = lastCurrentPost.getAttribute("data-posturl");
			history.pushState(null, null, lastCurrentPost.getAttribute("data-posturl"));
			ga('send', 'pageview', lastCurrentPostUrl.replace("http://superela.com", ""));

			if (isLastPost) {
				loadNextPost();
			}
		}
	}
	verifyToLoadPost();
	setInterval(verifyToLoadPost, 50);

	// --------------------------------
	function getCurrentPost () {

		isLastPost = false;
		var screenTopPosition = window.pageYOffset;
		var posts = document.getElementsByClassName("post");
		for (var i=posts.length-1; i>=0; i--) {
			var post = posts[i];
			var postTopPosition = post.offsetTop;
			var postRelativePosition = postTopPosition - screenTopPosition;
			if (postRelativePosition <= screenHeight - bottomMarginPostDetection) {
				if (i==posts.length-1) isLastPost = true;
				return post;
				break;
			}
		}

	}

	// --------------------------------
	function loadNextPost() {

		var relatedPostsGroups = document.getElementsByClassName("related-posts");
		firstRelatedPostsGroup = relatedPostsGroups[0];
		lastRelatedPostsGroup = relatedPostsGroups[relatedPostsGroups.length-1];
		var firstRelatedPostURL = lastRelatedPostsGroup.getElementsByTagName('a')[0].getAttribute('href');

		var firstRelatedPostId = lastRelatedPostsGroup.getElementsByTagName('li')[0].getAttribute('data-poid');
		firstRelatedPostId = firstRelatedPostId.replace("in-", "");

		var postURL = "/wp-content/themes/simplemag/single/post.php?post_url=" + firstRelatedPostURL + "&post_id=" + firstRelatedPostId;

		$.ajax({
			url: postURL,
			dataType: 'html',
			async: true,
			complete: function(result) {
				$("body").append(result.responseText);

				relatedPostsGroups = document.getElementsByClassName("related-posts");
				lastRelatedPostsGroup = relatedPostsGroups[relatedPostsGroups.length-1];

				$("ul.related_post.wp_rp:last li").shuffle();

				loadPromotedLinks();

				//loadComments(firstRelatedPostURL);
				var posts = document.getElementsByClassName("post");
				var lastPost = posts[posts.length-1];

				FB.XFBML.parse(lastPost);
				adjust_video_dimension();
			}
		});

	}

	// --------------------------------
	var promotedLinksInterval;
	function loadPromotedLinks() {

		promotedLinksInterval = setInterval(function() {
			isFirstPromotedLinksLoaded = (document.querySelector('.AdBox')==null) ? false : true;

			var firstRelatedPosts = firstRelatedPostsGroup.querySelectorAll('li');
			var lastRelatedPosts = lastRelatedPostsGroup.querySelectorAll('li');
			for (var i=4; i<lastRelatedPosts.length; i++) {
				lastRelatedPosts[i].innerHTML = firstRelatedPosts[i].innerHTML;
			}

			if (isFirstPromotedLinksLoaded) {
				clearInterval(promotedLinksInterval);
			}
		}, 500);

	}
</script>
<script src="//superela.com/wp-content/themes/simplemag/js/jquery-unveil-lazyload.js"></script>
<script>
$(document).ready(function() {
  $("img").unveil();
});
</script>

    {'base':'u','letters':/[\u0075\u24E4\uFF55\u00F9\u00FA\u00FB\u0169\u1E79\u016B\u1E7B\u016D\u00FC\u01DC\u01D8\u01D6\u01DA\u1EE7\u016F\u0171\u01D4\u0215\u0217\u01B0\u1EEB\u1EE9\u1EEF\u1EED\u1EF1\u1EE5\u1E73\u0173\u1E77\u1E75\u0289]/g},

    {'base':'w','letters':/[\u0077\u24E6\uFF57\u1E81\u1E83\u0175\u1E87\u1E85\u1E98\u1E89\u2C73]/g},
    {'base':'x','letters':/[\u0078\u24E7\uFF58\u1E8B\u1E8D]/g},
    {'base':'y','letters':/[\u0079\u24E8\uFF59\u1EF3\u00FD\u0177\u1EF9\u0233\u1E8F\u00FF\u1EF7\u1E99\u1EF5\u01B4\u024F\u1EFF]/g},
    {'base':'z','letters':/[\u007A\u24E9\uFF5A\u017A\u1E91\u017C\u017E\u1E93\u1E95\u01B6\u0225\u0240\u2C6C\uA763]/g}
];
var changes;
function removeDiacritics (str) {
    if(!changes) {
        changes = defaultDiacriticsRemovalMap;
    }
    for(var i=0; i<changes.length; i++) {
        str = str.replace(changes[i].letters, changes[i].base);
    }
    return str.replace(/[^a-z0-9\s]/gi, '').replace(/[_\s]/g, ' ');
}
</script>

            </header>
	    
        
</article>
<article class="grid-4 post-45896 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-estilos tag-como-se-vestir"  style="padding-bottom:27px !important; border-bottom:3px solid #000 !important;">

  j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
  '//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
  })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-KWJH');</script>
  <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->

            </header>

<article class="grid-4 post-41607 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-corpo tag-aceitacao-do-corpo tag-amor-proprio tag-autoestima tag-corpo"  style="padding-bottom:27px !important; border-bottom:3px solid #000 !important;">

    <figure class="entry-image">
    	<a href="http://superela.com/tipos-de-corpo-feminino">

    <header class="entry-header">

        <h2 class="entry-title">
            <a href="http://superela.com/tipos-de-corpo-feminino">Nem uma Miss se importa com os tipos de corpo feminino. Por que voc deveria?</a>
        </h2>
                <div class="entry-meta">
           <span class="entry-category"><a href="http://superela.com/corpo/" >Corpo</a></span>, 
        </div>
        <span class="entry-author">
        	Por <a href="http://superela.com/colunista/superela/" rel="author">Marcela De Mingo</a>
        </span>
            </header>
	    
        
</article>

        <h2 class="entry-title">
            <a href="http://superela.com/famosas-com-estrias">Homem repara em estrias?</a>

      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-preface-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-preface-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-preface" class="zone zone-preface clearfix container-12">
    <div class="grid-4 region region-preface-first" id="region-preface-first">
  <div class="region-inner region-preface-first-inner">
    <div class="block block-panels-mini block-career-header block-panels-mini-career-header odd block-without-title" id="block-panels-mini-career-header">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="panel-display panel-1col clearfix" id="mini-panel-career_header">
  <div class="panel-panel panel-col">
    <div><div class="panel-pane pane-node careers-landing-header" >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="ds-1col exp-layout-text-related node node-explore-banner view-mode-full clearfix ">
    <div class="field-group-format group_scroll_group field-group-div group-scroll-group scroll-pane-explore speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field-group-format group_explore_meta field-group-div group-explore-meta  speed-fast effect-none"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="dc:title"><h2>Rioters Wanted</h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We&rsquo;re looking for humble but ambitious, razor-sharp professionals who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. These individuals will become part of entrepreneurial teams who prefer action (kicking ass) over process and bureaucracy (taking names). We embrace those who see things differently, who <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A43u58HQ-A8&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank">aren&#39;t afraid to experiment</a>, and who have a healthy disregard for the rules.</p>
<p>Applicants should first learn about Riot and play <em>League of Legends </em>because we&#39;re looking for people who, like us, take play seriously and for whom it&#39;s never &quot;just a game.&quot; We play lots of games, especially our own, because hands-on gaming experience is our ultimate guiding compass.</p>
<p>We&#39;re hiring for multiple levels, from associate to lead, so don&#39;t get hung up on the title; it&#39;s all about the team. For the roles below that are listed by team name, we&#39;re hiring for varying levels of XP.</p>
 </div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-explore-related-articles field-type-node-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">
 <div class="ds-1col node node-article view-mode-featured_teaser clearfix ">
	<a class="news-teaser" href="/articles/20150817/547/working-riot" title="Working at Riot"><span class="glass"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/news_thumbnails-grey/public/content/article/images/primary_thumb/working_at_riot_thumb.jpg?itok=k777m2n0" width="400" height="400" alt="Working at Riot" /></span><span class="base"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/news_thumbnails/public/content/article/images/primary_thumb/working_at_riot_thumb.jpg?itok=-a6TFsHg" width="400" height="400" alt="Working at Riot" /></span><span class="teaser-meta"><span class="headline">Working at Riot</span></span></a></div>
</div><div class="field-item odd">
 <div class="ds-1col node node-article view-mode-featured_teaser clearfix ">
	<a class="news-teaser" href="/articles/20121029/531/funding-riots-play" title="Riot unlocks Play Fund"><span class="glass"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/news_thumbnails-grey/public/content/article/images/primary_thumb/PCCafe3-1x1.jpg?itok=sa36eCkw" width="400" height="400" alt="Rioter plays" /></span><span class="base"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/news_thumbnails/public/content/article/images/primary_thumb/PCCafe3-1x1.jpg?itok=pnXAPmJc" width="400" height="400" alt="Rioter plays" /></span><span class="teaser-meta"><span class="headline">Riot unlocks Play Fund</span></span></a></div>
</div><div class="field-item even">

    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Neighbors baffled by STL lobby</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20140910/242/neighbors-baffled-stl-lobby" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky self-posted author- odd clearfix" id="node-article-242">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Neighbors baffled by STL lobby" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 10-03-12</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20140910/242/neighbors-baffled-stl-lobby">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20140910/242/neighbors-baffled-stl-lobby">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/Lobby-Header.jpg?itok=awkf1-fU" width="700" height="299" alt="Katarina welcome the St. Louis Rioters to work." /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>On the 10th floor of a certain office building in a certain city in a certain state in Midwestern America, there&rsquo;s a certain elevator lobby that seems to spark an awful lot of discussion. You see, in a downtown district dominated by lawyers, bankers, and other srs businesses, this particular lobby has a vibe that surprises tie-clad business types. It could be the concrete floors. It could be the exposed ductwork.</p>
<p>It&rsquo;s more likely it has something to do with the gigantic, floor-to-ceiling murals of well-armed<em> League </em><em>of Legends </em>champions that greet them each time the doors open on what they call &ldquo;the fun floor.&rdquo; Rioters call it home. What started as a weathered band of engineers gathered in a local Rioter&rsquo;s basement has grown into <a href="/articles/20120625/504/riot-games-st-louis" target="_blank">one of the biggest game dev houses in the city</a> with over 30 team members, semi-regular industry meetups, and an onsite kegerator.</p>
<p>Here are a few quotes we&rsquo;ve heard some of our briefcase-toting friends deploy after catching a glimpse of the Riot St. Louis studio:</p>
<ul>
	<li>
		&ldquo;What is this place?&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;You&rsquo;re from that gaming company, aren&rsquo;t you? You&rsquo;re not in a suit.&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;I wish I worked there.&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;That must be a really cool place to work.&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;Wow! What do you guys do?&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;When will you guys have an open house?&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&quot;We don&rsquo;t see many people with beards around here very often.&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;If you ever need a scumbag family attorney, let me know.&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;Don&rsquo;t take this the wrong way, but I knew you worked on ten as soon as I saw you.&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;Are you guys hiring?&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;I wish I worked on your floor.&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;Still don&rsquo;t have carpet yet?&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;Your floor looks exciting. Is it fun?&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;So you&rsquo;re that gaming company! Yeah&hellip;I play a few games myself.&rdquo;</li>
	<li>
		&ldquo;Someday I just want to get off on this floor and get lost in it.&rdquo;</li>
</ul>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span><div class="field-group-format group_tags field-group-div group-tags clearfix speed-none effect-none"><h3><span>Tags:</span></h3><div class="field field-name-field-topic field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/topic/riot-manifesto-stories" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Riot Manifesto Stories</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/topic/rioter-perks" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Rioter Perks</a></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="/categories/category" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Working @ Riot Games</a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-tags field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/tags/office" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Office</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/tags/cool-stuff" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Cool stuff</a></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="/tags/office-environment" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Office environment</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/tags/challenge-convention" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Challenge convention</a></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="/tags/st-louis" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">St. Louis</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/tags/focus-talent-team" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Focus on talent &amp; team</a></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="/tags/development" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Development</a></div></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-office-location-tag field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-inline clearfix"><div class="field-label">Office Location:&nbsp;</div><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/office-locations/saint-louis" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Saint Louis</a></div></div></div>  </div>
